title: Fenwick Tree (Binary Indexed Tree)
description: A Fenwick Tree, or Binary Indexed Tree (BIT), is a data structure that provides efficient methods for prefix sum queries and updates.
keyPoints: Supports prefix sum queries and updates in O(log n) time.
Simpler to implement than segment trees for some use cases.

techniques.title: Prefix Sum Query
techniques.codeSnippet: function query(i) { let sum = 0; while (i > 0) { sum += bit[i]; i -= i & -i; } return sum; }
techniques.description: Query the prefix sum up to index i using a Fenwick Tree.

codeSnippet.code:
// Fenwick Tree (BIT) structure
class FenwickTree { constructor(n) { this.bit = Array(n+1).fill(0); } }
